title: Piers Morgan lashes out at Britain's most notorious prisoner Charles Bronson's fiancee over 'publicity stunt'
text:
Piers Morgan lashes out at Britain's most notorious prisoner Charles Bronson's fiancee over 'publicity stunt' Ex-Coronation Street star Paula Williamson got engaged to the 64-year-old twice-married robber on Valentine's Day Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Piers Morgan lashes out at Charles Bronson's fiance Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Notorious jailbird Charles Bronson proposed to his ex-Coronation Street actress girlfriend on Valentine's Day. 
And the 64-year-old twice-married robber fiance Paula Williamson was on Good Morning Britain this morning, defending herself to Piers Morgan and Susanna Reid. 
Armed robber Bronson has been behind bars for 41 years, and all but four of them in solitary confinement, after repeatedly having his sentence increased for attacking prison staff and taking them hostage. 
And Paula - who has also starred in Hollyoaks and Emmerdale - has known Charles for four years, and has only met him four times over that period, with the first being in November 2016. 
A shocked Piers immediately accused her of getting engaged to the criminal - who spends 22 hours a day in solitary confinement - for a "publicity stunt". Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
